input: A luxurious walk-in closet with built-in wardrobes, a central island for accessories, and a full-length mirror. There are no seating options.
edit: Add an upholstered bench by the full-length mirror.
output: A luxurious walk-in closet with built-in wardrobes, a central island for accessories, and a full-length mirror with an upholstered bench by it.
